title: SAFEMODE FPS LAG?
body:
I'm using an asus laptop and usually hit around 30fps on league, but as soon as a teamfight starts i jump right back down to somewhere between 1 and 10.

So... I thought, if I try and play league in safemode I'll have better FPS?

Going through champ select etc and my client was smoooooooooooooooth. crisp clean.
As soon as the game started I capped at 3fps and could NOT go above? 

Anybody got any help/suggestions? please? i'm desperate? :(?

replies.body: It sounds like there might be an issue causing your game files to not render properly.  It could also just be outdated drivers, but let's find out.  Go over the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, and you should be good to go!  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

I've already looked through that. It's something that involves safemode. According to a friend safemode doesn't run the required drivers for gaming performance which is inevitably bending me over.

Do you know if theres any way I can enable these specific drivers or... anything?
